extendedInfo.description: FiiNote is the most convenient note app for android.The app is compatible with android 2.0 ~ android 4.3(and later). It is designed for both Phone and Pad.Feature list:1, Unique hybrid model for combined handwriting and keyboard.2, Text,paint,voice,photo,video...Note everything.3, Calender,alarm,todo...Getting things done.4, Infinite canvas, text box, DIY templates, real pen style...Too many incredible functions inside.5, Organized by books, tags, bookmarks, calendar. Archive and trash box are also supported.6, Integrate with FiiRecorder, a background recorder using little resource.7, Compatible with multiple cloud providers, fast incremental backup & restore, unlimited restore points.8, Less permission is required.NOTE:It is the Evaluation Edition, all functions are available but the "Nag-ware" will appear after ten days. There is a purchasable version(FiiNote full function key) on the Google Play. You also can buy it by PayPal.We will support Japanese(Done), Korean(Done), Spanish(Done), German(Done), Russian(Done), French(Done), Italian(Done), Portuguese(Done) before Aug 5!================================To FreeNote+(7.x) user:We would like to send a FREE code to our former FreeNote+ user.If you bought FreeNote before July 13(2013), we will send you a code that can activate 3 different devices.If you bought FreeNote between July 14 and Oct. 1 (2013), we will send you a code that can activate 1 device.If you bought FreeNote+ with Google wallet, please send us your GMail & the order number in your Google wallet.If you bought FreeNote with PayPal, please send us your PayPal EMail & the transaction number.Thanks for your support!flyable@fiistudio.com================================Keywords:feature: handwriting handwritten Note taking æåè®°äºæ¬ ä¾¿ç­¾æ¬ åç¬è¿¹Recommend to work withï¼FiiContact, FiiContacts, FiiContactNames, Fii Contact Names, Backup your folders, PDF2JPG, File2PDF, FiiRecorder, Fii Silent recorder, FiiBackup, Facebook twitter gmail evernote catch notes noteeverything gallery, é¨æå¯«, å°è±¡ç­è¨Usage: stay organized remember research GTD diary memo whiteboard schedule agenda draft plan meeting TODO list finance class paper sketch

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: only been using this version for a short time, however I can not fault it and for work purpose, meetings etc coupled with galaxy tab 3 handwriting recognition it gives more than enough functionality and seems very stable.
reviews.author: john whitham

reviews.title: LOL $18.10 for full version?
reviews.comment: Is that a misprint? LOL Retards, if someone is dumb enough to pay $18.10, then shoot for the moon and charge $99.10? LOL. 1 star for idiotic price.
reviews.author: arabia d

reviews.title: FiiNote, note everything is FreeNote+ on steroids!
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app! FiiNote is to FreeNote as Windows 7 was to XP. I have been a \"flyable\" (app creator/designer) fan from the beginning. He is always approachable & listens to what the users say. In today\'s age this is a rarity & greatly appreciated!   FiiNote truly is the all-in-one app for note taking! If you are new to it I tell you invest some time to learn it before snap judging it. This  is not just an app; FiiNote is a Suite for handwritten or typed notes, drawing, and the UI makes sense!
reviews.author: Cory Orel

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Was buying his other note pad , saw this thought give it a go already looks impressive  Another brilliant app from same peeps
reviews.author: Danna lee

reviews.title: excellent!!!!!
reviews.comment: i see you listened to one of my suggestions you are the man!!! your app is awsome hopefully you would add in the future the paper size selection when exporting to pdf
reviews.author: Orlando bermudez

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I would buy this if it would only export the baselines/looseleaf lines along with the notes.
reviews.author: Richie Chan

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: So good!!!! You can back-up and restore across multiple devices, the export to other services (evernote) looks good, the handwriting interface is better than freenote. A good solid upgrade for freenote users, and an excellent note application for first timers.  My only gripe is learning the new interface. But that is a very minor issue.
reviews.author: Chris Knowles

reviews.title: One of the best note taking app
reviews.comment: Closest thing to paper. Handwriting or keyboard, drawing, photos. Love it. And a very responsive developer. Had a stupid question on importing images which he answered in a few hours.
reviews.author: Abizar Lakdawalla

reviews.comment: The best note application I ever used.

reviews.comment: cannot change notes storage location to SDCARD

reviews.comment: Ideal
reviews.author: samer sebak

reviews.title: a very good app but..
reviews.comment: It is a wonderful app. Infinite paper was what I was missing in Handy Note. However, erasers do not really erase but mask, and it is difficult to move around drawings;  I can never select an enitre math formula that I had drawn..a very strange app..
reviews.author: youna park

reviews.title: Great Note app
reviews.comment: New and interesting approach!! I really like it!  But, BIG minus (like in handy note app)  is low export resolution on pdf and jpg. On my nexus 7, export resolution is same as screen resolution, which is way too low for A4 format pdf!!? -  This is not suitable for print....

reviews.comment: Little confused on the management of the files. Seems to be only based on date of creation. Would like different notebooks like Catch organization.

reviews.title: Crazy
reviews.comment: You must be obsessed with note taking
reviews.author: Pt Su

reviews.title: Gd
reviews.comment: Goood
reviews.author: Stella Ng

reviews.title: Favorite App
reviews.comment: There\'s a few great note taking apps but this one is by far my favorite because of its beautiful and easy to use handwriting feature.   I had been using Freenote for a few months and I loved it so much I had to try this one.   I  am a student and much of my studying relies on my ability to remember what I\'m learning. I remember better while I\'m writing versus typing. I had Freenote on an older tablet and when I went to buy a new one, I went with an Android system instead of iOS because this app really helped me through my classes. I look forward to having it available on iOS though.  I love Fiinote and I would recommend some updates like: option to automatically adding a space after writing a word like in Freenote and the ability to insert pics and have words wrap around it.  I found a way to write around my inserted pictures but uou have to export the file in the direction you wrote and aligned the image or else the words will cover up the picture. At least that\' s what happens on my tablet.  The developer is awesome. He replies quickly to emails.  I don\'t buy many apps but I\'d support this one.
reviews.author: Diana Tom

reviews.title: Handy and smart
reviews.comment: The only weakness: $ sign with every meaningful tool. I hope designers can look into and improve this aspect
reviews.author: Umar AR

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: The best drawing note app !

reviews.comment: hope the price could be lowered
